name: browser-automation-platform
description: Browser automation platform - one command deploy

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BE,FE -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n BE,FE -c cyan,magenta "npm run start -w backend" "npm run start -w frontend"
